Text.Page:
Looks like lizards are next on the agenda!

Just kill some {@LinkCreature:24#5#swift storm lizards} and call this one good.

Let Elston know when you've taken care of it.
Many thanks! Now we don't have to worry about being eaten while looking for relicsâ€”I mean, while patroling the road!
Don't be scared. Under all those scales, teeth, claws, and past that spiked tail, a swift storm lizard is just as mortal as you are.
